metadata.title: CVE-2021-3738 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Use after free in Samba AD DC RPC server. The AD DC RPC server can use memory that was free()ed when a sub-connection is closed.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Fixing this in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS would require substantial code backports. We will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. In environments where this is of concern, we recommend updating to a more recent Ubuntu version.

criterions.comment: samba package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.13.14+dfsg-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
